languages.text: "И это — все?! Духи обманывают вас, ваш жрец впал в слабоумие и разучился читать руны, и вы приговорили мою стаю?! Трусы!"
"And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"
languages.original_text: "И это — все?! Духи обманывают вас, ваш жрец впал в слабоумие и разучился читать руны, и вы приговорили мою стаю?! Трусы!"

traits.locale_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “就因为这个吗？鬼怪欺骗了你们。你们的符文牧师脑子有点不太好使，已经不记得该怎么看符文了。就因为这个，你们就认为我的狼群已经死了吗？一群懦夫！”
languages.original_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"

traits.locale_text: “就因为这个吗？鬼怪欺骗了你们。你们的符文牧师脑子有点不太好使，已经不记得该怎么看符文了。就因为这个，你们就认为我的狼群已经死了吗？一群懦夫！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「それがどうした？魂が欺いてるんだ…お前の司祭はちょっと鈍ってる、ルーンの読み方を忘れたんだろ。俺の群れを死んだことにしたいがためにな。卑怯者め！」
languages.original_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"

traits.locale_text: 「それがどうした？魂が欺いてるんだ…お前の司祭はちょっと鈍ってる、ルーンの読み方を忘れたんだろ。俺の群れを死んだことにしたいがためにな。卑怯者め！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Ya está? Los espíritus le han nublado el juicio. ¿Su sacerdote tiene un desliz y se olvida de leer un par de runas y ya da a mi manada por muerta? ¡Cobardes!».
languages.original_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ya está? Los espíritus le han nublado el juicio. ¿Su sacerdote tiene un desliz y se olvida de leer un par de runas y ya da a mi manada por muerta? ¡Cobardes!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « C'est tout ? Les esprits vous trompent. La cervelle de votre prêtre s'est ramollie et il ne sait plus interpréter ses runes s'il donne ainsi ma meute pour morte. Vous n'êtes que des lâches, rien de plus ! »
languages.original_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout ? Les esprits vous trompent. La cervelle de votre prêtre s'est ramollie et il ne sait plus interpréter ses runes s'il donne ainsi ma meute pour morte. Vous n'êtes que des lâches, rien de plus ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Und das ist alles? Die Geister täuschen Euch – Euer Priester vergisst aufgrund eines leichten Dachschadens, wie man Runen deutet, und deshalb erklärt Ihr mein Rudel für tot? Feiglinge!"
languages.original_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"

traits.locale_text: "Und das ist alles? Die Geister täuschen Euch – Euer Priester vergisst aufgrund eines leichten Dachschadens, wie man Runen deutet, und deshalb erklärt Ihr mein Rudel für tot? Feiglinge!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bu kadar mı? Ruhlar sizi kandırmış. Rahibin kafayı sıyırıp rün okumayı unutmuş olmalı. Sırf bu yüzden sürümü ölü mü sandınız? Korkaklar!"
languages.original_text: "And that's it? The spirits deceive you — your priest went a little soft in the head and forgot how to read his runes, and for that you give my pack up for dead? Cowards!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar mı? Ruhlar seni kandırıyor. Rahibin biraz kafayı sıyırmış ve rün okumayı unutmuş olmalı. Sırf bu yüzden sürümü ölü mü sandınız? Korkaklar!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
